The images in the Facebook post were pub: 2020, with a caption stating that a truck carrying toilet paper had crashed after being hijacked.
The top image in the post showed a pile: while the bottom image was a purported screenshot from a 7News broadcast featuring an aerial image of a truck with a chyron mentioning the hijacking incident in Lithgow.
The claim was found to be misleading as: and the claim appeared to have originated from a satirical Facebook page called The Blue Mountains Times.
A Google reverse search of the top image: and a Google keyword search found a 7News video report about the incident on its Facebook page.
